directions: Heat oil in a wok or large heavy skillet over medium-high heat. Add beef, and cook until evenly brown. Stir in beef stock, soy sauce and butter. Push meat to the side, and toss in onion, celery and mushrooms. Cook, stirring, for about 4 minutes. Add spinach, and cook for 2 more minutes.
ingredients: 1 pound beef round steak, sliced diagonally into 3 inch pieces
title: Sukiyaki Beef
